overall.description: Find contiguous unmasked data in a masked array along the given axis.

axis.description: Axis along which to perform the operation. If None (default), applies to a flattened version of the array, and this is the same as flatnotmasked_contiguous.

endpoints.description: A list of slices (start and end indexes) of unmasked indexes in the array. If the input is 2d and axis is specified, the result is a list of lists.
